name.japanese: リトルイーストブルー

islandName: Little East Blue (also known as Kansorn Island)
description: An island inhabited by settlers from East Blue who recreated their homeland. Features replicas of famous East Blue locations including a mini Baratie, a mansion resembling Kaya's, a giant windmill like Foosha Village, Zoro's master's dojo, and an Orenami Fanclub dedicated to Nami.

keyEvents.title: Largo Reveals Ami Ami no Mi
keyEvents.description: The battle escalates as Largo reveals his Devil Fruit powers on the island, threatening the safety of Little East Blue.
keyEvents.significance: The village becomes the battleground for a Devil Fruit user's assault.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Declares Protection of Little East Blue
keyEvents.description: Luffy intervenes to protect both Boss and the village from the Amigo Pirates' assault.
keyEvents.significance: The Straw Hats commit to defending the village, reinforcing their heroic nature.
